h3_title: Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide
content: Certain times, it can even perform a charging attack by moving its head down, but you can lure it into charging the wall and dazing itself, letting you score a bunch of free hits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Wise-Voice' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Certain times, it can even perform a charging attack by moving its head down, but you can lure it into charging the wall and dazing itself, letting you score a bunch of free hits.
